title: Luxury Resort For Long Term Lease Kalpitiya
details:
Luxury Resort For Long Term Lease At Kalpitiya (Under Construction)

★★★★★ ONCE IN A LIFE TIME OPPORTUNITY TO RUN YOUR OWN 100 MILLION LUXURY RESORT WITH A LOW INVESTMENT ★★★★★

- Located in the heart of tourism zone Sethawadiya, Kalpitiya
- Comes with 14 Luxury Chalets and 8 standard rooms
- Common Amenities include large Infinity pool, restaurant , mini bar, common washroom, lounge area, viewing deck and spacious garden
- Located Right on the edge of the Kalpitiya kite lagoon with beach access
- Reception, staff quarters, driver quarters are included.
- Service of a UK based support staff, local business consultant, technical engineer, maintenance staff, ,24/7 security service, CCTV surveillance all included in the lease package.
- UK Business adrress and UK business consultant provided.
- Fully customized website according to the clients requirement provided free of charge
- Assistance with online registering with OTAs provided free of charge.
- Other inventory includes jet skis, paddle boats, hydro power inflatable boats,kayaks, scooters, mountain bikes, kite equipment, all kitchen equipments & utilities and all furniture & fittings
- Buildings can be customized according to clients requirement as it’s still under construction
- Ideal to be run as a family resort or kite school

This is a once in a life time opportunity to run your own 100 million luxury resort in partnership with a very low investment.

If interested, please get in touch on 077 77 33823 with us for further info.

Thanks for looking 🙂
